content: private use only do not copy or resell the pattern instagram @coffeencrochet coffee n crochet 3 rustic sunflower square us rustic sunflower square 5 1 slip_stitch in between the 3rd and the 4th double_crochet of the petal ch1 = 1 single_crochet ch2 ch1-pet in the 3rd loop the one that crosses straight over the single_crochet on if a round starts with a double_crochet the first double_crochet is replaced by ch3 or a faux double_crochet finish with 1 slip_stitch in 3rd chain if 1st double_crochet is replaced with ch3 the back side of the next single_crochet ch2 *1 single_crochet in between the 3rd and the 4th the rug is made using two strands of yarn double_crochet of the next 6dc-petal ch2 ch1-pet in the 3rd loop of the next single_crochet ch2* repeat from *-* 6 more times finish with 1 slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet chain 1 color 1 8 ch1-pet cut yarn weave in ends work a magic_ring or ch4 slip_stitch in 1st chain 12 double_crochet in the ring finish with 1 slip_stitch in 1st double_crochet 2 2 double_crochet in each double_crochet around finish with 1 slip_stitch in 1st double_crochet 24 double_crochet cut yarn weave in ends 3 color 2 attach yarn in any double_crochet ch2 1 double_crochet in the 1st double_crochet = 1 2dc-cluster skip 2 double_crochet *ch3-pet in next double_crochet skip 2 double_crochet* repeat from*-* 6 more times 2dc-cluster in 1st double_crochet you worked in finish with 1 double_crochet in 1st double_crochet = 1 ch3-space 8 ch3-pet 6 color 3 attach yarn with 1 single_crochet in any 4 4 double_crochet in the last ch3-space around the double_crochet 1 single_crochet in between the ch3-petals ch1-space 2 single_crochet in the same 1st ch1-space 6 double_crochet in next ch3-space 1 single_crochet in between ch3-petals x7 2 double_crochet in the last 3 half_double_crochet in next ch2-space 3 double_crochet in next ch3-space double_crochet finish with 1 slip_stitch in 1st double_crochet 8 6dc-petals ch2-space 2 treble_crochet ch3 2 treble_crochet in next ch1-space 1 corner made *3 double_crochet in next ch2-space 3 half_double_crochet in next ch2-space 3 single_crochet in next ch1-space 3 half_double_crochet in next ch2-space 3 double_crochet in next ch2-space 2 treble_crochet ch3 2 treble_crochet in next ch1-space * repeat from *-* 2 more times 3 double_crochet in next ch2-space 3 half_double_crochet in next ch2-space finish with 1 slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 4 corners made ©camilla n skjønhaug coffeencrochet com post@coffeencrochet com for private use only do not copy or
